channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Huge pothole almost cracked my wheel, 8th December
item.description:
There is a huge pothole just after the zebra crossing in a blind spot, I have smashed my car wheel there twice now and it needs to be addressed urgently. I have a 4x4 if I was a cyclist or a motorcyclist I would have injured myself.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Salusbury Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.category: Utility Works and Temporary Traffic Lights

item.title: Thurlow Hill SE21 yellow plastic Lambeth grit bin, 8th December
item.description:
Thurlow Hill SE21 yellow plastic Lambeth grit bin next to house number 74 / opposite side of the road to Lambeth streetlight ID number 9. Please forward fixmystreet.com link to your contractor for picture and Google Streeview link. https://www.google.com/maps/place/82+Thurlow+Hill,+Norwood,+London+SE21+8JN/@51.4415233,-0.1010623,3a,75y,59.66h,79.02t/data=!3m7!1e1!3m5!1snp9oaqgLWgRX3rot3VLoDA!2e0!6shttps:%2F%2Fstreetviewpixels-pa.googleapis.com%2Fv1%2Fthumbnail%3Fcb_client%3Dmaps_sv.tactile%26w%3D900%26h%3D600%26pitch%3D10.981155469411505%26panoid%3Dnp9oaqgLWgRX3rot3VLoDA%26yaw%3D59.659362867233746!7i16384!8i8192!4m6!3m5!1s0x4876040f61c61935:0x146f51eadbff3295!8m2!3d51.4414757!4d-0.101254!16s%2Fg%2F11n06wpkfh?entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI1MTIwMi4wIKXMDSoASAFQAw%3D%3D

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Thurlow Hill, Tulse Hill, Greater London

item.title: VRM - SP14VNS flytipping, 8th December
item.description:
This vrm SP14VNS has been seen fly tipping in the spinel court communal bin area. A neighbour caught them and when questioned they claimed to live at flat 16 which is a lie as that is my flat. Can you come and remove all the dumped items that this scum bag has left please.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Richmer Road, Slade Green, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: At top right of Carlingford Road, close to the junction of Willoughby, 8th December
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Carlingford Road, Belsize Park, Greater London

item.description:

item.title: Fly tipping and overflowing litter bin., 8th December
item.description:
On Timber Pond Road, SE16 6AG, opposite junction with Dock Hill Avenue, SE16 6AQ a number of items have been fly tipped next to litter bin, litter bin is overflowing and needs emptying, and blue council refuse bags need removing.

item.title: Disgusting amount of rubbish, 8th December
item.description:
I’m writing regarding the bin area at 5 King Edward’s Road, which is currently in a very poor and unhygienic state. It appears that rubbish hasn’t been collected for several weeks, and the area has become increasingly messy

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Tudor Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole with acute edges, 8th December
item.description:
Another pothole has opened up on rectory lane. This one is deep, with acute edges, and right on the site where cars passing on the road would position their near side tyres to pass, presenting considerable potential for an accident. This road is in terrible condition on the whole and needs fixing. Pot holes are a continuous problem here and constantly opening up. It should be assessed for a complete rebuild.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rectory Lane, North Cray, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Non-Household waste being dumped/fly tipped. Attracting Vermin, 8th December
item.description:
All the Flats of Cray buildings, store bins away from their property to the rear of La stalla restaurant. Some of the bins have no lids or are damaged. Rubbish and extra non domestic waste being dumped/fly tipped around the bin area. This area is not owned by the buildings/flats. Bins are constantly overflowing & new non domestic waste is being dumped Dailey. Broken/no lid bins are attracting vermin & rubbish is constantly being dragged all over the area.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Foots Cray High Street, North Cray, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
